alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Morris; Somerset (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:58PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Morris, northeastern Hunterdon and northern Somerset Counties through 530 PM EST... At 454 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds along a cold front extending from near West Milford to Califon. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morristown, Dover, Madison, Hopatcong, Florham Park, East Hanover, Lincoln Park, Kinnelon, Chatham, Boonton, Butler, Wharton, Rockaway, Morris Plains, Mount Arlington, Mendham, Mountain Lakes, High Bridge, Stanhope and Riverdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 19 and 27, and between mile markers 40 and 42. Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 27 and 48. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 22 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
